We are aware of the fact that RAMESH ARAVIND, DATTANNA, MANOHMURTHY, namma UVCEs proud alumni who with their skills have created an everlasting impact on Kannada film industry. 
UVCEs leading colligate Club which aims to improve one's skill in acting is Thathva. 
Thathva was established by Abhishek Chakma from ECE batch of 2015, inspired by club Darpan. Currently Thathva consists of 60+ students involved in the activity. Members of Thathva took part in a street play ensemble called Manthan which took place in Forum mall, Kormangla. 
The main objective is to *Promote theatre in college *Set up a platform for theatre enthusiasts *to collaborate and do what they love
